cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with index coding, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). It specifically focuses on the concept of locality in index coding, which is related to the network information (cs.NI) and graph theory (cs.DS) aspects of the problem. The paper also uses a clique covering technique, which is a combinatorial optimization method (cs.CC). Finally, the paper discusses privacy in index coding, which is a topic in security and privacy (cs.SI).
